text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: It's finally happening, Tokyo Mega Ilumi!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Wow…… illuminated, totally different vibe than usual ……!

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: It's safely sparkling. It was worth everyone's effort.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: The highlight of the event is the "Mega Tree"!

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: I collected and decorated so many of them.

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: The fruit of everyone's efforts, I'm sure it will be a magnificent photojournalistic tree. ……!

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: Anrea, well, ……! That's great, shiny, shiny, shiny! ……!

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Wow, the lights we all decorated are that beautiful…… Oh yes, pictures! Everyone in Tomakomai needs to see them: ……!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Ricky☆Lucky☆MegaTree☆Thanks to everyone's hard work!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Whoa, boys. It's good to be admiring the Tree, but I think it's time to get ready for the live show.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Ha, that's right! Thanks Inari!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Talmae～! Ms. Acute! Let's go to the waiting room!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Haha! You three girls are so nice to look at!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Oh. I feel like I was helped a lot this time by the cheerfulness of those three.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Yes☆ Falco's proud trio of juniors…

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: But still…… what a magnificent "tsurii"! It's dazzling to look at.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Finally, the Christmas live performance is in the books☆ Talmae, Acute, are you ready?

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text: Of course, we're always ready!

text_block_list.name: Wonder Acute
text_block_list.text: We practiced a lot in between helping out. It's perfect.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's go then! The three of us are going to play a Christmas live song―

text_block_list.name: All 3
text_block_list.text: KIRARI MAGIC SHOW"!
